name: BigDecimal
description: Represents a decimal number with arbitrary precision.

constructors.name: BigDecimal

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The string representation of the decimal number.

constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the BigDecimal class with the specified string representation.

constructors.name: BigDecimal

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The double value of the decimal number.

constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the BigDecimal class with the specified double value.

methods.name: add

parameters.name: augend
parameters.description: The decimal number to add to this instance.

methods.description: Returns the sum of this instance and the specified decimal number.

methods.name: subtract

parameters.name: subtrahend
parameters.description: The decimal number to subtract from this instance.

methods.description: Returns the difference between this instance and the specified decimal number.

methods.name: multiply

parameters.name: multiplicand
parameters.description: The decimal number to multiply this instance by.

methods.description: Returns the product of this instance and the specified decimal number.

methods.name: divide

parameters.name: divisor
parameters.description: The decimal number to divide this instance by.

methods.description: Returns the quotient of this instance and the specified decimal number.

methods.name: remainder

parameters.name: divisor
parameters.description: The decimal number to divide this instance by.

methods.description: Returns the remainder of this instance divided by the specified decimal number.

methods.name: compareTo

parameters.name: other
parameters.description: The decimal number to compare this instance to.

methods.description: Compares this instance to the specified decimal number.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this object.
